label: 大疑録
対訳語: A record of grave doubts; ca. 1713
本: The Cambridge History of Japan, Volume 4:  Early Modern Japan . Cambridge University Press . 1991
説明文: A treatise [by Kaibara Ekken (1630-1714), which] argued for the disengagement of the empirical study of nature from its moralistic and political issues (p. 622). [貝原益軒]
